<a id="GraphElement"></a>

# GraphElement

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [GraphFrame](GraphFrame.md), [GraphNode](GraphNode.md)

A container that represents a basic element that can be placed inside a [GraphEdit](GraphEdit.md) control.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**GraphElement** allows to create custom elements for a [GraphEdit](GraphEdit.md) graph. By default such elements can be selected, resized, and repositioned, but they cannot be connected. For a graph element that allows for connections see [GraphNode](GraphNode.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="GraphElement_signal_delete_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**delete_request**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_delete_request)

Emitted when removing the GraphElement is requested.

<!-- classref-signal -->

**dragged**\ (\ from\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), to\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_dragged)

Emitted when the GraphElement is dragged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_signal_node_deselected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**node_deselected**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_node_deselected)

Emitted when the GraphElement is deselected.

<!-- classref-signal -->

**node_selected**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_node_selected)

Emitted when the GraphElement is selected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_signal_position_offset_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**position_offset_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_position_offset_changed)

Emitted when the GraphElement is moved.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_signal_raise_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**raise_request**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_raise_request)

Emitted when displaying the GraphElement over other ones is requested. Happens on focusing (clicking into) the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_signal_resize_end"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resize_end**\ (\ new_size\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_resize_end)

Emitted when releasing the mouse button after dragging the resizer handle (see [resizable](GraphElement.md#GraphElement_property_resizable)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_signal_resize_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resize_request**\ (\ new_size\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_signal_resize_request)

Emitted when resizing the GraphElement is requested. Happens on dragging the resizer handle (see [resizable](GraphElement.md#GraphElement_property_resizable)).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="GraphElement_property_draggable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **draggable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_property_draggable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draggable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_draggable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can drag the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_property_position_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **position_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_property_position_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_position_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_position_offset**\ (\ )

The offset of the GraphElement, relative to the scroll offset of the [GraphEdit](GraphEdit.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_property_resizable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **resizable** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_property_resizable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_resizable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_resizable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can resize the GraphElement.

\ **Note:** Dragging the handle will only emit the [resize_request](GraphElement.md#GraphElement_signal_resize_request) and [resize_end](GraphElement.md#GraphElement_signal_resize_end) signals, the GraphElement needs to be resized manually.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_property_selectable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **selectable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_property_selectable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_selectable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_selectable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can select the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphElement_property_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **selected** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_property_selected)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_selected**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_selected**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the GraphElement is selected.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="GraphElement_theme_icon_resizer"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **resizer** [ðŸ”—](#GraphElement_theme_icon_resizer)

The icon used for the resizer, visible when [resizable](GraphElement.md#GraphElement_property_resizable) is enabled.
